column5: Anyone ver go to this lodge or have any info on the fishing etc at Pakashkan. We are going there for the first time in may. Thanks
You are in for a serious treat. Tons of walleyes and huge northerns , simply amazing! Bring minnows.

I am going with some friends for the first time too. They have been going there for many years. It was one guys first time last year he said he is going every year rnow. We leave from mn. May 28th Good luck

I will be up the road a little further for a week starting June 4th and thought about coming back and fishing here for a day. There is a boat launch on the north end of outlet bay. Anyone ever fish that part of the lake. If I go there I will post a report.
